pour ta gouverne

  1. for your information, I'll have you know that… (used to introduce a rebuttal to the interlocutor's previous statement, especially when the statement angered or offended the speaker)
    Synonyms: je te ferai savoir que…, (informal) pour info
trans: for your information, I'll have you know that…

title: pour ta gouverne
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /puʁ ta ɡu.vɛʁn/
